name: prompthouse-mcp
description: Connect to your PromptHouse prompts directly in Claude Desktop
long_description:
This extension allows you to access, search, and execute your saved PromptHouse prompts directly within Claude Desktop. Get instant access to your prompt library without leaving your conversation.

Features:
- List all your saved prompts
- Retrieve prompt content by ID
- Supports both online and local PromptHouse servers
- Secure access-link authentication

access_link.title: PromptHouse Access Link
access_link.description: Your personal access link from PromptHouse settings page. Go to https://prompthouse.app, sign in, and click 'Set Up MCP' to get your link.

mode.title: Connection Mode
mode.description: Choose between web (online PromptHouse) or local server

tools.name: get_prompt_list
tools.description: List all available prompts with titles, descriptions, and tags

tools.name: get_prompt
tools.description: Retrieve complete prompt content by ID including messages and metadata
